attributes.action: Impeach the Prime Minister Gordon Brown for gross misconduct
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Impeach the Prime Minister Gordon Brown for  gross misconduct "The Prime Minister is the head of the UK Government and is ultimately responsible for the policy and decisions of Government.
As head of the UK Government the Prime Minister also oversees the operation of the civil service and Government agencies, appoints members of the cabinet, and is the principal Government figure in the House of Commons."

rejection.details: Neither the PM nor the Government can impeach the PM. You should make your suggestion to an individual MP.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
